project.description:
Build the dpkg source distributions
Nodes with the launchpad label need the 'RethinkDB Packaging' GPG keys available.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ -d rethinkdb ] || git clone https://github.com/rethinkdb/rethinkdb.git rethinkdb
rm *.dsc *.changes *.build *.tar.gz || true
cd rethinkdb
git fetch origin git checkout origin/$BRANCH
for ubrelease in oneiric precise quantal raring ; do make UBUNTU_RELEASE="$ubrelease" build-deb-src done
for ubrelease in lucid maverick natty; do make BUILD_PORTABLE=1 UBUNTU_RELEASE=$ubrelease build-deb-src done
